comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: sseloske: Thank you for the information about Cherep-Spiridovich. We will add the fuller form of his name and his dates to the description when we reload the database.

comment.author: 40710079@N05
comment._content: from Wikipedia:  Count (General) Cherep-Spiridovich had his headquarters in the United States; he was even more obviously a clinical case than some of his colleagues. He introduced himself in his books as 'The Slav Pope', 'The Slav Bismarck','The possessor of the faculty to foresee events'
